synopsis.text: This exhilarating anime follows the mountaineering escapades of Aoi Yukimura, a timid first-year high school student, and her vivacious friend, Hinata Kuraue. Initially drawn to indoor hobbies, Aoi's interest in mountain climbing piques when Hinata introduces her to the captivating allure of the great outdoors. Joined by the enthusiastic Kokona Aoba and their seasoned upperclassman Kaede Saitou, the girls embark on a series of thrilling adventures, from backyard camping trips to conquering the formidable slopes of Japan's highest peaks. As they navigate through the trials and triumphs of their shared hobby, their bond strengthens, and they forge new friendships along the way. With dreams of witnessing the breathtaking sunrise from the summit of Mount Fuji, the girls are unstoppable in their pursuit of reaching new heights and embracing the beauty of nature.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
